description: Returns the  Rule that is specified by the RuleId that you included in the GetRule request.

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description: The RuleId of the  Rule that you want to get. RuleId is returned by  CreateRule and by  ListRules.

nested_items.description: Rule: Contains MetricName, Name, an array of Predicate objects, and RuleId.
Predicate: Each Predicate object contains DataId, Negated, and Type.
